text: Rudolf Ziegler (born 27 November 1957) is a German rowing coxswain. He competed in the men's coxed pair event at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:German male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of West Germany Category:Rowers at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:People from Sonthofen Category:Coxswains (rowing)
title: Rudolf Ziegler
